body:
Fixes #8196.

Fixes issue mentioned by @adamjstewart at [#8090 (comment)](https://github.com/spack/spack/pull/8090#issuecomment-390375659), along with some other lingering undefined names and flake8 errors.

- there were some leftover spack.* names being used after we removed globals and moved everything in the top-level namespace to spack.pkgkit

- point those references to their new homes
title: fix leftover references to spack.<symbol>
